title: The Literature of Knowledge - speaker asserts

content.question: In the seventh sentence ("Men have so . . . give information"), the speaker asserts that the

choices.label: public has failed to consider literature except as a source of information
higher function of literature is primarily to convey information
higher functions of literature are dismissed as paradoxical
higher functions of literature are understood but not discussed by the public

content.answer: public has failed to consider literature except as a source of information

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
